description:
Meta Quest 3S pre-orders are now live! The Quest 3S will be shipping on 15th October. Here's my hands on first impressions where I compare the Quest 3S to the Quest 2 and it's more expensive brother, the Quest 3.

You can pre-order the Meta Quest 3S or buy a Meta Quest 3 here and get Batman Arkham Shadow for free! (affiliate); https://www.meta.com/affiliates/58UZMEFTp

Thanks to Meta for providing flights and accommodation so I could attend Meta Connect 2024.

Let me know what you all think of the Meta Quest 3S in the comments below...

Thanks for watching []-) 

VR HEADSETS:
Meta Quest 3 / 3S: https://www.meta.com/affiliates/58UZMEFTp
PlayStation VR2: https://amzn.to/48RAFQx
Bigscreen Beyond: http://bit.ly/3IiI3cz

title: Quest 3S Hands On - Meta Quest 3 Just Got More Affordable!
